StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEventsWithSubjects]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@StartDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @EventSourceId int, @Organiza.onId int WITH RECOMPILE AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT DISTINCT e.ID INTO #EventList FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] E INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSubject] ESub ON E.ID = ESub.Even.d INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSource] ES ON E.EventSourceId = ES.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] ET ON E.EventTypeId = ET.ID WHERE (@EventSourceId = 0 or (E.EventSourceId = @EventSourceId)) and (@Organiza.onId = 0 or (E.Organiza.onId = @Organiza.onId)) and ( ( @StartDate is null AND @EndDate is null) OR ( (E.StartDate <= @EndDate AND @EndDate IS NOT NULL) AND (E.EndDate >= @StartDate AND @StartDate IS NOT NULL ) ) )
SELECT e.ID, STUFF((SELECT ', ' + s.SubjectName FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSubject] s WHERE E.ID = s.Even.d ORDER BY s.SubjectName FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') AS SubjectNames INTO #SubjectStu.List FROM #EventList e GROUP BY e.ID
SELECT E.ID AS EventId, E.Organiza.onId, E.Loca.on, E.Comments, E.IsComplete, E.StartDate, E.EndDate, E.LastUpdateDate, E.LastUpdateUserId, E.Remarks, ES.Id AS EventSourceId, ES.Name AS EventSourceName, ET.Id AS EventTypeId, ET.Type AS EventTypeName, sub.SubjectNames INTO #ResultSet FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] E INNER JOIN #EventList el ON E.ID = el.ID INNER JOIN #SubjectStu.List sub ON E.ID = sub.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventSource] ES ON E.EventSourceId = ES.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] ET ON E.EventTypeId = ET.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventApproval] EA on E.ID = EA.ID WHERE (@EventSourceId = 0 or (E.EventSourceId = @EventSourceId)) and (@Organiza.onId = 0 or (E.Organiza.onId = @Organiza.onId)) and ( ( @StartDate is null AND @EndDate is null) OR ( (E.StartDate <= @EndDate AND @EndDate IS NOT NULL) AND (E.EndDate >= @StartDate AND @StartDate IS NOT NULL ) ) ) ORDER BY E.StartDate desc
SELECT * FROM #ResultSet
DROP TABLE #EventList DROP TABLE #ResultSet DROP TABLE #SubjectStu.List
SET NOCOUNT OFF
END
